configuration.stem: Explore the image of the human brain to see the main functions of its different areas.

options.title: Frontal Lobe
options.description: The frontal lobe is the “boss” of the cerebral cortex. It coordinates planning, organization, behaviors, and emotions.

options.title: Parietal lobe
options.description: The parietal lobe processes sensory information related to taste, temperature, and touch.

options.title: Temporal lobe
options.description: The temporal lobe is associated with hearing, language, and olfactory senses.

configuration.imageAlt: In this activity, there is a diagram of the human brain. You can click on the hotspots for more information about the functions of the frontal lobe, the parietal lobe, the occipital lobe, and the temporal lobe.
